greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Riordan array (1/(1-x^2),x(1+x)/(1-x)).
comment: Row sums are A097076(n+1). Diagonal sums are abs(A077902).
formula: Number triangle whose columns are generated by x^k*(1+x)^(k-1)/(1-x)^(k+1)
Number triangle T(n, k)=sum{j=0..n-k, C(k-1, j)C(n-j, n-k-j)};
mathematica: t[n_, k_] := Binomial[n+k, k]*Hypergeometric2F1[-k+1, -n, -n-k, -1]; Table[t[n-k, k], {n, 0, 11}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 22 2013 *)
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Dec 08 2004
